alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 09 at 5:09PM CST until December 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN SUNFLOWER AND LEFLORE COUNTIES... At 509 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sunflower, or 13 miles northeast of Indianola, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Greenwood, Itta Bena, Schlater, and Quito around 515 PM CST. Money around 520 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central, north central and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
